attributes.action: Improve facilities for dealing with food waste, like promoting Fareshare and providing to local charities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
after a concert at the Opera House Manchester I went in to a 'Small supermarket' only to see the manager clearing loads (and I mean 100s) of fresh baked food (buns, bread) that was fit to eat into big clear bin bags! With so many starving people and charities struggling to feed them this a completely immoral practice. I know there is a cost to disposal but surely working with a charity that takes edible food away would be cheaper than disposing of it!
It could alternatively have been reduced to low prices
